content: वशिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [वशः अस्त्यस्य इनि] {@--1@} Powerful. {@--2@} Being under control, subdued, subject, submissive. {@--3@} One who has subdued his passions (used like a noun also); प्रस्थापयामास वशी वसिष्ठः <ls>R. 2. 70</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 90</ls>, <ls n="R.">19. 1</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5. 28.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} A ruler, lord. {@--2@} A sage.
